death_place.zh-cn: 北京市东城区卫生部北京医院

description.zh-cn: 中华民国及中华人民共和国的政治人物与军事人物，原国家级副职领导人。他促成了北平和平解放，后来担任中华人民共和国首任水利部部长长达23年。
description.en: A Chinese military and political figure of the Republic of China and the People's Republic of China, formerly a national-level deputy leader. He facilitated the peaceful liberation of Beiping and later served as the first Minister of Water Resources of the PRC for 23 years.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事家及政治人物，晋系军阀的领导人。
description.en: A Chinese military and political figure, leader of the Jin clique warlords.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家及军事家，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A Chinese politician and military leader who served as the leader of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: A Chinese communist revolutionary who was the founder of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一任国务院总理，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China and a major leader of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 傅作义长女，中国共产党地下党员，在北平和平解放过程中起了重要作用。
description.en: Eldest daughter of Fu Zuoyi, an underground member of the Communist Party of China who played an important role in the peaceful liberation of Beiping.

description.zh-cn: 傅作义的秘书，真实身份是中国共产党安插在傅作义身边的地下党员。
description.en: Fu Zuoyi's secretary, who was actually an underground member of the Communist Party of China placed by his side.

description.zh-cn: 傅作义的部下，曾任绥远省政府主席，后率部起义，加入中国人民解放军。
description.en: A subordinate of Fu Zuoyi, former Chairman of the Suiyuan Provincial Government, who later led his troops to defect to the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 傅作义的堂弟，1957年被打成右派，在劳动教养期间死于三年大饥荒。
description.en: Fu Zuoyi's cousin, labeled a rightist in 1957 and died during the Great Famine while undergoing re-education through labor.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国大陆时期著名军事院校。
description.en: A famous military academy during the Republic of China period on the mainland.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期由阎锡山领导的山西地方军队。
description.en: The local army of Shanxi led by Yan Xishan during the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期，由中国共产党领导的常规军队。
description.en: The main regular army force of the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间，由国民政府在华北设立的军事指挥机构。
description.en: A military command established by the Nationalist Government in North China during the Second Chinese Civil War.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国水利电力部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国水利电力部
en: Ministry of Water Resources and Electric Power of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经存在的组成部门。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1930年在中国发生的一场大规模军阀混战。
description.en: A large-scale civil war fought between warlords in China in 1930.

description.zh-cn: 1936年傅作义部在绥远省抵抗伪蒙军进攻的战役。
description.en: A campaign in 1936 where Fu Zuoyi's forces resisted the invasion of the puppet Mongol army in Suiyuan province.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党与中国共产党之间在中国境内爆发的第二次内战。
description.en: The second civil war fought in China between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国历史上的一场政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in the history of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国于1959年至1961年期间发生的一场全国性饥荒。
description.en: A nationwide famine in the People's Republic of China from 1959 to 1961.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战“三大战役”之一，最终导致北平和平解放。
description.en: One of the 'Three Great Campaigns' of the Second Chinese Civil War, which ultimately led to the peaceful liberation of Beiping.

description.zh-cn: 指平津战役中，傅作义与中国共产党达成协议，使其部队撤出北平，中国人民解放军进驻北平的历史事件。
description.en: Refers to the historical event during the Pingjin Campaign where Fu Zuoyi reached an agreement with the Communist Party of China, leading to the withdrawal of his troops from Beiping and the entry of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 在傅作义的影响下，时任绥远省政府主席董其武率部宣布起义，接受中国共产党的领导。
description.en: Under the influence of Fu Zuoyi, then Chairman of the Suiyuan Provincial Government Dong Qiwu led his troops to declare an uprising and accept the leadership of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 傅作义于1915年入保定陆军军官学校第5期步兵科，1918年毕业。
description.en: Fu Zuoyi entered the 5th Infantry Division of Baoding Military Academy in 1915 and graduated in 1918.

position.zh-cn: 晋军军官、第二战区北路军总司令
position.en: Jin Army Officer, Commander of the Northern Route Army of the Second War Area

description.zh-cn: 傅作义毕业后加入阎锡山领导的晋军，长期在其麾下任职，直至1938年12月出任第八战区副司令长官后摆脱其控制。
description.en: After graduation, Fu Zuoyi joined the Jin Army led by Yan Xishan and served under him for a long time, until he broke free from his control after being appointed Deputy Commander of the Eighth War Area in December 1938.

description.zh-cn: 傅作义长期在阎锡山的晋军中服役并屡立战功，从中校升至中将。
description.en: Fu Zuoyi served in Yan Xishan's Jin Army for a long time, earning numerous military merits and rising from lieutenant colonel to lieutenant general.

description.zh-cn: 傅作义在中原大战中作为阎锡山部将与蒋介石的中央军作战；在第二次国共内战期间，作为华北国军最高指挥官与共产党作战，服从于身为国民政府首脑的蒋介石，但随着战局不利，最终选择和平解放北平，与蒋介石决裂。
description.en: Fu Zuoyi fought against Chiang Kai-shek's Central Army as a general of Yan Xishan during the Central Plains War; during the Second Chinese Civil War, as the supreme commander of the Nationalist forces in North China, he fought against the Communists under Chiang Kai-shek's leadership, but eventually chose the peaceful liberation of Beiping as the war situation deteriorated, breaking with Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 傅作义指挥其部队在绥远击退了伪蒙军的进攻，取得了百灵庙大捷。
description.en: Fu Zuoyi commanded his troops to repel the attack of the puppet Mongol army in Suiyuan, achieving a major victory at Bailingmiao.

description.zh-cn: 傅作义仿照中国共产党领导的八路军的建军经验，在其部队中成立政治工作机构，并制定类似《三大纪律八项注意》的纪律。
description.en: Fu Zuoyi modeled the army-building experience of the Eighth Route Army led by the Communist Party of China, establishing political work agencies in his troops and formulating disciplines similar to the 'Three Main Rules of Discipline and Eight Points for Attention'.

description.zh-cn: 在平津战役中，傅作义的部队接连遭受失败，其嫡系部队损失惨重，最终促使其决定与中共和谈。
description.en: During the Pingjin Campaign, Fu Zuoyi's forces suffered successive defeats, with his core troops sustaining heavy losses, which ultimately prompted him to negotiate peace with the Communists.

description.zh-cn: 1947年12月，蒋介石任命傅作义为华北剿匪总司令部总司令，统一指挥华北五省军队。
description.en: In December 1947, Chiang Kai-shek appointed Fu Zuoyi as the Commander-in-Chief of the North China Bandit Suppression Headquarters, unifying the command of troops in five provinces of North China.

description.zh-cn: 傅作义作为华北剿匪总司令，最终决定与中国共产党方面达成和平协议，促成了北平的和平解放。
description.en: As the Commander-in-Chief of the North China Bandit Suppression Headquarters, Fu Zuoyi ultimately decided to reach a peace agreement with the Communist Party of China, facilitating the peaceful liberation of Beiping.

description.zh-cn: 傅冬是傅作义的长女。
description.en: Fu Dong is Fu Zuoyi's eldest daughter.

description.zh-cn: 傅冬作为中共地下党员，在其父傅作义身边工作，不断进行劝说，为促成北平和平解放起了重要作用。
description.en: As an underground member of the CCP, Fu Dong worked alongside her father Fu Zuoyi and continuously persuaded him, playing a crucial role in bringing about the peaceful liberation of Beiping.

description.zh-cn: 董其武是傅作义的部下，曾接替傅作义担任绥远省政府主席，并在傅作义的影响下率部起义。
description.en: Dong Qiwu was a subordinate of Fu Zuoyi, succeeded him as the Chairman of the Suiyuan Provincial Government, and led his troops in an uprising under Fu's influence.

description.zh-cn: 傅作义于1949年8月返回绥远，最终促成其旧部董其武于9月19日率部起义，实现绥远和平解放。
description.en: Fu Zuoyi returned to Suiyuan in August 1949 and ultimately facilitated the uprising of his former subordinate Dong Qiwu's troops on September 19, achieving the peaceful liberation of Suiyuan.

position.zh-cn: 水利部/水利电力部部长
position.en: Minister of Water Resources / Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，傅作义长期担任水利部及后来的水利电力部部长，是时任国务院总理周恩来的下属。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, Fu Zuoyi served for a long time as the Minister of Water Resources and later the Minister of Water Resources and Electric Power, subordinate to then-Premier Zhou Enlai.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命爆发之初，周恩来将傅作义列入应予保护的干部名单中，对其进行保护。
description.en: At the beginning of the Cultural Revolution, Zhou Enlai included Fu Zuoyi in a list of cadres to be protected, thereby protecting him.

description.zh-cn: 据蒋介石日记记载，傅作义于1963年派专人带去亲笔书写的“悉贡所能”四字，向蒋介石秘密表达意向。
description.en: According to Chiang Kai-shek's diary, Fu Zuoyi sent a special messenger in 1963 with a handwritten note of four characters, 'sī gòng suǒ néng' (I will do all I can), secretly conveying his intentions to Chiang.

description.zh-cn: 傅作义的堂弟傅作恭在甘肃夹边沟农场劳动教养期间，因三年大饥荒而去世。
description.en: Fu Zuoyi's cousin, Fu Zuogong, died during the Great Famine while undergoing re-education through labor at Jiabiangou Farm in Gansu.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共内战期间，傅作义作为国民党高级将领，与毛泽东领导的共产党军队为敌，并曾发表致毛泽东的公开电进行谴责。
description.en: During the Second Chinese Civil War, Fu Zuoyi, as a high-ranking Nationalist general, was an enemy of the Communist forces led by Mao Zedong and once issued a public telegram condemning him.
